Public Class ConstContainerBidirectionalIterator(Of TValue) Implements IBidirectionalIterator(Of TValue)
generic <typename TValue> public ref class ConstContainerBidirectionalIterator : Microsoft::VisualC::StlClr::Generic::IBidirectionalIterator<TValue>

summary.span: 定义一个迭代器，它可以通过使用增量运算符正向访问容器中的元素，也可以通过使用减量运算符后向访问容器中的元素。

span.span: Defines an iterator that can access elements in a container in the forward direction by using the increment operator and in the backward direction by using the decrement operator.

summary.span: 无法修改迭代器指向的元素。

span.span: The element that the iterator points to cannot be modified.

summary.span: 双向迭代器可用于任何需要常数输入或常数输出迭代器的情况。

span.span: Bidirectional iterators can be used anywhere that a constant input or constant output iterator is required.
